Qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Math, Statistics, Economics, Supply Chain, Engineering, or a related field and 4 years of experience
Experience must include the following: SQL;
Advanced data visualization skills using software, such as Tableau or Power BI;
Data warehousing and relational database structure;
Responsibilities: Develop and own standardized intake processes for building new reports, new features, and enhanced functionality of existing tools

Perform advanced analysis by leveraging large data sets from multiple systems to surface actionable insights that support Merchandising in making data-driven decisions around product assortment, site placement, promotions, and operational performance
Lead and support recurring requirements gathering and product release checkpoints with internal and external business partners
Support Merchandising leadership by building reports and performing ad-hoc analyses to drive favorable outputs across customer experience and financial metrics
